item.title: Europe retaliates after Trump tariffs on metals take effect
item.description: Ursula von der Leyen, president of the European Commission, said in a statement that the EU "must act to protect consumers and business."

item.title: Pope begins 27th day in hospital after resting peacefully overnight
item.description: The pope rested peacefully overnight as he begins his 27th consecutive day in hospital this morning, the Vatican said.
